function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Opportunities for older adults to exercise have been greatly impacted due to COVID-19 lockdown measures.","Impact":"Potential decline in physiological function and health status of older people during quarantine.","Mitigation":"Promotion of gentle exercise and utilization of domestic gardens for maintaining basic physical activity at home.","Technologies":"None specified.","People":"Older adults.","Owner":"Health authorities, community organizations."},{"Description":"Exposure to nature can benefit psychological health, wellbeing, and quality of life.","Impact":"Reduction in incidence of anxiety, insomnia, and low mood during the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Promotion of spending time in the garden to improve sleep quality and mental well-being.","Technologies":"None specified.","People":"General population, older people specifically (>60 years).","Owner":"Health authorities, community organizations."}]}
